name: StakerDAO
intro: Building cross-chain financial assets in a compliant manner
introduce: StakerDAO is a platform for governing financial assets in a decentralized, secure, and compliant manner. The StakerDAO community builds and manages products for on-chain governance, cross-chain synthetics, and tokenized real-world assets. Blend (BLND) is the first basket token offered by StakerDAO, enabling holders to go in and out of a position without traditional staking lockups and may offer tax advantages versus holding the underlying PoS tokens.
